Reminder Summary

Select your Employees from the list below. You can search for your employees by entering their name or email in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 employees are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional employees. New employees can be added by clicking the "Add New Employee" link in the upper right hand corner of this page.

Enter your Employee contact information. If you assign this employee to a User Group below, the system will automatically email them their Logon ID and Password, unless disabled in your setup options.

You can grant this employee system access as a Manager, Administrator or Clerk. Each role has a limited set of functionality it can perform. The employee's User Status can also be set to Active, Inactive or Read Only. Inactive Employees cannot login to the system. Read Only Employees can logon to the system but they cannot change any information. Setting the User Group to nothing will disable access to the system.
